name: Mole of Moscow
description:
If it does not fit use [Ctrl-] key combination to get it right and also use the fullscreen button

The game was created for historically accurate Gamejam. I am Yogesh the team lead, programmer, designer of the game. My friend Dillion MJL was the lead artist for this project. 

Controls:
WASD -or- left/right -> movement

We created this in 1 week. I hope you will like the game. Please enjoy
